form.singleServiceDesc: A one-off service that will occur once on the specified date.
form.regularServiceDesc: A service that will occur regularly based on the schedule within the specified period.
form.alternateServiceDesc: A service that will occur on every alternate day within the specified period.
form.searchStartTimeDesc: Select the starting date/time for your search.
form.searchEndTimeDesc: Select the ending date/time for your search.

tooltip.location: Move the map to your location

message.branchInstruction: Select the best category for your request
message.registryInstruction: Click on any record in the table to view its summary
message.completeInstruction: To complete the service, please input the following details:
message.dispatchInstruction: Dispatch the resources for the scheduled service on
message.cancelInstruction: Please provide a reason for the cancellation of the scheduled service on
message.reportInstruction: Report an issue with the service on {date}. Please include the reason in your report:
message.matchedFeatures: Found matching features! Updating the visualisation...
message.noMatchFeature: No matching feature found! Please refine your search parameters.
message.noMatchMetaWithTime: No matching feature found! Attempting to display all features within the selected time period...
message.noAddressFound: No address found! The postal code may be incorrect. Please enter the address manually.
message.noInstances: No instances available. Please create a new instance.
message.mapSelectFeature: Select a feature on the map to explore its information in detail.
message.mapOverlapFeatures: Multiple overlapping features detected within the clicked area. Please select a specific feature for more detailed information.
